com.devtence.will.dev.commons

Class GcsAppIdentityServiceUrlSigner

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.devtence.will.dev.commons.GcsAppIdentityServiceUrlSigner

  • public class GcsAppIdentityServiceUrlSigner
extends java.lang.Object
    This class exposes objects stored on the Google Cloud Storage to the public by creating temporary URLs. The URL will expire after a configured time defined by the constants in the class.

    This security layer needs to work with the default permissions set for the bucket in the Google Cloud Storage console.

    Since:
    2016-05-16
    Author:
    plessmann
